UPN Train #339- Delayed
UPN train #339, scheduled to arrive Waukegan at 3:42 PM, may be operating 30 to 35 minutes behind schedule due to police activity. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPN train #361 will not operate

UPDATE: UPN train #361 scheduled to depart Ogilvie Transportation Center at 5:40 pm, will not operate due to earlier police activity. Train #363 will be the next train to accommodate passengers making all stops to  Kenosha.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UPN Train #337- delayed and operational change

UPN train #337, scheduled to arrive Kenosha at 3:45 PM, may be operating 45 to 55 minutes behind schedule due to police activity and will express from Highland Park to Waukegan. Train #339 will accommodate passengers at intermediate stops.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
University Park Station East Entrance and East Parking Lot Are Open - Canopies Refurbished (Update)

The University Park canopy refurbishing project is complete. Passengers have full access to the east and west station and parking lot platform entrances. Metra appreciates your patience throughout the project.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The Van Buren Platform Elevator Is Out Of Service
The Van Buren Street Platform Elevator is out of service. Customers can use Museum Campus or the South Water as alternate boarding stations.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW Train #2219 Delayed

MDW train #2219 scheduled to arrive Big Timber Road/Elgin at 2:52 PM, may be operating 10 to 15 minutes behind schedule, due to following other trains. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
